title: Drawing, Plate Design:  Gémeaux [Gemini],  from the Le Zodiac Travesti [The Farcical Zodiac] Service, 1824
title_raw: Plate Design:  Gémeaux [Gemini],  from the Le Zodiac Travesti [The Farcical Zodiac] Service
medium: pen and brown/black ink, brush and brown/black wash, pink/tan watercolor, white gouache, graphite on cream laid paper, mounted on cream laid paper, ruled border in pen and brown ink
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown/black ink over graphite, on support above image:  Les Gémeaux [Gemini]; below image:  tu ne mas pas écrit ça... [You did not write me that..]; in graphite, upper right corner of mount:  5
description: Setting is a house interior with bed in niche, right rearground, and open door, left middleground.  A husband, in doorway, arrives home from a trip and is greated by his wife and small dog.  He points to a cradle, center foreground, that holds two babies.  He exclaims to his wife, "you did not tell me about that."

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, Plate Design:  Gémeaux [Gemini],  from the Le Zodiac Travesti [The Farcical Zodiac] Service, 1824. pen and brown/black ink, brush and brown/black wash, pink/tan watercolor, white gouache, graphite on cream laid paper, mounted on cream laid paper, ruled border in pen and brown ink. 1989-13-39.
